team_analysis.organizational_structure: Given the early stage (pre-seed) and small team size (4 employees, growing to 8), Ambr AI likely has a flat organizational structure. The founders are probably heavily involved in all aspects of the business. As the company grows, a more defined organizational structure with functional departments (e.g., engineering, sales, marketing, customer success) will likely be implemented.
